title: (x) antique serif "Slave pens" - Packard {Mark S}
content:
I know the name of this face is right on the tip of my tongue, but I can't remember it for the life of me.   
   
The "S" alone should be enough to ID it.   
   
 ![sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052140im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26204.jpg)
author: seanglenn

comments.content: This came up in another thread recently. I think it was Packard.
Except, I think Sean's sample is the bold weight.
Yes, I found that I actually had a copy of OPTI Packard Bold, which matches exactly. Did any company produce the non-bold version? If so, who?
